Package controller

Class MainForm

java.lang.Object
controller.MainForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainForm extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class contains all the methods of the main form controller.

      public MainForm()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Populates the parts and products tables with data. Loads the part table with all the existing parts and the product table with all the existing products.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • onActionAddPart

      void onActionAddPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Loads the add part form when pressed. Sets the new scene as the add part form and sets it on the stage.
      Parameters:
      event - the add under the part table button is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionAddProduct

      void onActionAddProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Loads the add product form when pressed. Sets the new scene as the add product form and sets it on the stage.
      Parameters:
      event - the add button under the product table is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionDeletePart

      void onActionDeletePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Deletes the selected part. The selected part in the part table is deleted when pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - the delete button under the part table is pressed

    • onActionDeleteProduct

      void onActionDeleteProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Deletes the selected product. The selected product in the product table is deleted when pressed but will fail if the part was associated parts.
      Parameters:
      event - the delete button under the product table is pressed

    • onActionExitMainForm

      void onActionExitMainForm(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Closes the program. Shows a window asking the user to confirm they want to end the program and ends if they say yes.
      Parameters:
      event - the exit button is pressed

    • onActionModifyPart

      void onActionModifyPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Loads the modify part form when pressed. Sets the new scene as the modify part form and sets it on the stage.

      RUNTIME ERROR: This method can cause a null pointer exception if the button is pressed when a part isn't selected from the parts table. This exception is caused because the object passed to the transferPart() method is null is not part has been selected. To avoid this exception I used an if block that only calls the transferPart() method is the parameter is not null and has a window pop up telling hte user that the that not part has been selected if the parameter is null.

      Parameters:
      event - the modify button under the part table is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionModifyProduct

      void onActionModifyProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Loads the modify product form when pressed. Sets the new scene as the modify product form and sets it on the stage.
      Parameters:
      event - the modify button under the product table is pressed
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionMainFormPartSearch

      void onActionMainFormPartSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Searches for the input in the part search text box. Searches all parts for the input in the text box and either shows the found results in the part table or shows a window stating that the part was not found.
      Parameters:
      event - the enter key is pressed while cursor is in the search part box

    • onActionMainFormProductSearch

      void onActionMainFormProductSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Searches for the input in the product search text box. Searches all products for the input in the text box and either shows the found results in the product table or shows a window stating that the product was not found.
      Parameters:
      event - the enter key is pressed while cursor is in the search product box
